Uses of Class
edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl.NumericalAxis

Packages that use NumericalAxis
edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl Package edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl provides low-level implementation classes for the high-level plotting classes in package edu.rit.numeric.plot. 
 

Uses of NumericalAxis in edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl
 

Subclasses of NumericalAxis in edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl
 class LinearAxis
          Class LinearAxis provides a linear axis on a plot.
 class LogarithmicAxis
          Class LogarithmicAxis provides a logarithmic axis on a plot.
